title: The Decks Ran Red [1958 - USA] (James Mason) adventure
description:
The Decks Ran Red (1958 - USA)

Adventure / Drama

starring . . . . James Mason, Dorothy Dandridge, Broderick Crawford
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0051524/


Danger and suspense sail the high seas in this nautical thriller that some commentators call uncommonly fierce for its time. James Mason plays the newly commissioned captain of a freighter docked in New Zealand and about to take off on its next voyage. Amongst his crew are two scuzzy thugs who have come up with a bizarre scheme to kill the entire crew, and captain, and take over the ship which they intend to sell off for a fortune. Things get complicated, however, when the ship's cook arrives with his Maori wife who turns out to be a very flirtatious woman, to say the least, with a penchant for wearing very tight clothes. Filming took place in southern California aboard the Chios, Greece registered SS Igor, a World War II Liberty Ship held by the Los and Pezas shipowning families.


Video: XviD, 704x384, 23.976 fps, 1844 Kbps, 01h24m14s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps
Ratio: 1.85:1

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
